version_description:
ROOM 4 IS FINALLY HERE!

- New items
- New cats
- A SECRET added to the SAFE
- Fixed bugs and problems

If you want to make suggestions or tell us your feedback, hit us on twitter @HyperBeard or FaceBook www.facebook.com/HyperBeardGames

- Fixed bugs and problems

If you want to make suggestions or tell us your feedback, hit us on twitter @HyperBeard or FaceBook www.facebook.com/HyperBeardGames

- More than 70 new clothes added!
- Japanese is now part of our suported languages!
- Fixed bugs and problems

If you want to make suggestions or tell us your feedback, hit us on twitter @HyperBeard or FaceBook www.facebook.com/HyperBeardGames

- Added animations to coins and gems
- Added descriptions to items when cat returns
- Fixed bugs and problems

If you want to make suggestions or tell us your feedback, hit us on twitter @HyperBeard or FaceBook www.facebook.com/HyperBeardGames

Super optimizations! The game now takes up less than half the space on your device.

If you want to make suggestions or tell us your feedback, hit us on twitter @HyperBeard or FaceBook www.facebook.com/HyperBeardGames

The KleptoCats have discovered a whole NEW room and it's a blast from Japan!

Unlock all 100 new items and 30 new cats. So cute! MEOW.

If you want to make suggestions or tell us your feedback, hit us on twitter @HyperBeard or FaceBook www.facebook.com/HyperBeardGames

Brand NEW things to do with your cat! WASH your cat to make it happy. PLAY with your cat and earn coins. DRESS your cat in stylish outfits. Take a SELFIE and show off how good your cat looks!

Even more actions coming soon!!!

If you want to make suggestions or tell us your feedback, hit us on twitter @HyperBeard or FaceBook www.facebook.com/HyperBeardGames

Room 8 is finally here. Unlock it today! What will you discover in this crazy garage?! More strange items to collect and cats to add to your catalog.

If you want to make suggestions or tell us your feedback, hit us on twitter @HyperBeard or FaceBook www.facebook.com/HyperBeardGames

- Room 9 'The Attic' is available!
- New mini games section, always available
- Updated several interfaces to look better
- Polished art in later rooms
- Polished animations
- Fixed bugs and problems

If you want to make suggestions or tell us your feedback, hit us on twitter @HyperBeard or FaceBook www.facebook.com/HyperBeardGames

KleptoCats have their eyes set on Santa and his bag of presents! BeRAWR! Unlock the "Fireplace" and see who comes down the chimney. 15x brand NEW cats to unlock in this a-MEOW-zing Holiday update! Optimized for iPhone X.

Ever wonder what monstrous creatures exist in "The Garden"? MEOWwwwhahhhahaha.

The world's cutest kitties with a paw for things that aren't theirs, the KleptoCats, have discovered a brand NEW playground just in time for HALLOWEEN. Be the first to unlock the 10th room in the greatest cat game of 2017 and uncover all the spooky items.

Optimized for iPhone X. Now your favorite cat burglars can burgle your heart in the full glory of iPhone 5.8" Display. Christmas is just around the corner and the KleptoCats' frisky paws are itching for presents. Download today and prepare yourself for holiday fun.

KleptoCats have their eyes set on Santa and his bag of presents! BeRAWR! Unlock the "Fireplace" and see who comes down the chimney. 15x brand NEW cats to unlock in this a-MEOW-zing Holiday update! Optimized for iPhone X.

1x new room "The Arcade"
100x new items to collect from your favorite retro arcade games
30x high-tech klepto-kitties to discover
iPhone X optimizations
iPhone X Optimizations

- NEW FEATURE: Cloud Save
- Rotating "Special Deals" weekly in the store
- Other improvements and bug fixes
This game is now COPPA compliant! Welcome people, cats, aliens & inanimate objects of all ages!!!

- 1 new room "The Heavens"
- 30 cats to collect
- 100 items to steal!
- Removed Offerwall

- 2 new languages: German & Korean
- 1 new room "The Saucer"
- 30 cats to collect
- 100 items to steal!
- Weekly rotation of Special Deal!
- NEW FEATURE: Cloud Save

- Removed Offerwall

KleptoCats bring back all sorts of things. Snakes, books, sandwiches, more snakes, knives... Oh My CAT! Now they will also bring back puzzle pieces! PAW-some!!!
